        public void waitForData()
        Wait for new data from the driver station.

      • waitForData

        public void waitForData(long timeout)
        Wait for new data or for timeout, which ever comes first. If timeout is 0, wait for new data only.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The maximum time in milliseconds to wait.

      • isNewControlData

        public boolean isNewControlData()
        Has a new control packet from the driver station arrived since the last time this function was called?
        Returns:
        True if the control data has been updated since the last call.

      • getMatchTime

        public static double getMatchTime()
        An approxamation of the time left in the current period
        Returns:
        Time remaining in current match period (auto or teleop) in seconds

      • isDisabled

        public static boolean isDisabled()
        Determine if the Robot is currently disabled.
        Returns:
        True if the Robot is currently disabled by the field controls.

      • isEnabled

        public static boolean isEnabled()
        Determine if the Robot is currently enabled.
        Returns:
        True if the Robot is currently enabled by the field controls.

      • isAutonomous

        public static boolean isAutonomous()
        Determine if the robot is currently in Autonomous mode.
        Returns:
        True if the robot is currently operating Autonomously as determined by the field controls.

      • isTest

        public static boolean isTest()
        Determine if the robot is currently in Test mode.
        Returns:
        True if the robot is currently operating in Test mode as determined by the driver station.

      • isEStopped

        public static boolean isEStopped()
        Determine if the robot is currently Emergency stopped.
        Returns:
        True if the robot is currently emergency stopped.

      • isFMSAttached

        public static boolean isFMSAttached()
        Check if the Field Management System is attached to the DS
        Returns:
        True if the FMS is attached

      • isDSAttached

        public static boolean isDSAttached()
        Check if the Driver Station is attached to the robot
        Returns:
        True if we have a driver station

      • isOperatorControl

        public static boolean isOperatorControl()
        Determine if the robot is currently in Operator Control mode.
        Returns:
        True if the robot is currently operating in Tele-Op mode as determined by the field controls.

      • isSysActive

        public static boolean isSysActive()
        Check on the overall status of the system.
        Returns:
        Is the system active (i.e. PWM motor outputs, etc. enabled)?

      • isBrownedOut

        public static boolean isBrownedOut()
        Check if the system is browned out.
        Returns:
        True if the system is browned out
